technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Liver appears homogeneous with no focal lesions.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 25.78 bpm.
Breast tissue shows unremarkable lesion measuring 20.56 mm.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Prostate is isoechoic; volume approximately 12.95 cc.
recommendations: MRI or CT correlation may be helpful.
